dotnetType.name: FloatSchemaBuilderCase
dotnetType.summary: A schema builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.FloatingPointResolution" /> (single-precision).

returns.summary:
A successful <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.FloatSchema" /> build result if <paramref name="resolution" />
            is a single-precision <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.FloatingPointResolution" />; an unsuccessful
            <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.UnsupportedTypeException" /> build result otherwise.

typeSignatures.value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FloatSchemaBuilderCase extends Chr.Avro.Abstract.SchemaBuilderCase
